snippet.title: KLONOA Phantasy Reverie Series - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Venture into this side-scrolling remastered adventure with KLONOA Phantasy Reverie Series! KLONOA: Door to Phantomile and KLONOA 2: Lunatea's Veil will be coming to the Nintendo Switch on 7/8! 

More Info: http://spr.ly/6052KP6fr
